entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
